about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Leadership in Power, Control & Automation
about.intro: In the world of Power, Control, and Industrial Automation, precision is not optional — it is essential. This is why Circuit Rack was founded: to lead the digital transformation of trading technical components in energy systems, control panels, and industrial automation. We are a Multi-Vendor Marketplace built on three core pillars.

pillars.p1_desc: There is no room for unverified components. We enforce an intelligent Trust Score System that ensures only elite vendors in power, control, and automation can operate on our platform.
pillars.p2_desc: With advanced Semantic Search technology, we understand the language of power, control, and automation engineers. Search by describing the issue or technical specifications, and our system will guide you to the best-matched component.
pillars.p3_desc: We implement a full buyer-protection mechanism: your payment stays in a secure escrow account until you confirm the product’s condition and compliance.

about.closing: Our mission is to make industrial procurement faster, safer, and smarter.
